**Frequently Asked Questions**
Q: Do you support rDNS records?
A: Yes. You can setup rDNS records for IPv4 and IPv6 addresses via the control panel. The changes are applied instantly.

Q: How long does setup take?
A: Instant setup is included with all VPS orders. Linux VPS are typically installed within 2-3 minutes. Windows is installed within 10 minutes.

Q: What ports are open?
A: All ports are open and available for use by default.

Q: What are your accepted methods of payment?
A: We accept Paypal, Credit/Debit Cards, Bitcoin and many other crypto currencies.

Q: What comes installed on the VPS?
A: SSH is pre-installed to allow easy installation and management of your applications. Remote desktop access is supplied with Windows servers.

Q: Do you have any backup solutions in place?
A: Evolution Host have several layers of protection in place to ensure that the integrity of your data is maintained in any unforeseen eventuality. Our fully redundant raid arrays protect your data against hardware failure, with additional solutions such as daily offsite backups to ensure against physical disasters. Optionally, you can take advantage of our offsite rotating backup solution for €4.99 per month, allowing you to restore the state of your VPS to a previous point in time.

**Contact us**
If you have any questions, our team will be more than happy to assist you.
You can contact us by sending an email to support@evolution-host.com.

Please visit [https://evolution-host.com](https://evolution-host.com) for further information or for information regarding our other services.
